property.title: Modern 4-Bedroom Villa with Pool
property.description: This stunning 4-bedroom villa, located in the serene neighborhood of Riviera Palmeraie, offers the perfect blend of modern luxury and family comfort. Designed by the renowned KOF Builders, this home features spacious living areas, high-end finishes, and a private swimming pool, all within a secure and tranquil environment. Enjoy easy access to local amenities whilst residing in one of Cocody's most sought-after locations.

highlights.pool: Private swimming pool with modern deck
highlights.living: Spacious open-plan living and dining area
highlights.master: Master suite with walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom
highlights.proximity: Proximity to international schools and shopping centers

property.locationDesc: Located in the prestigious Riviera Palmeraie neighborhood of Cocody, this property offers excellent connectivity to major business districts, international schools, and shopping centers. The area is known for its secure environment and well-maintained infrastructure.
property.developerDesc: KOF Builders is a renowned construction company in Côte d'Ivoire with over 15 years of experience in delivering high-quality residential and commercial properties. Known for attention to detail and commitment to excellence.

about.title: About The Event
about.description: This exclusive webinar is designed for savvy investors looking to capitalize on the dynamic and rapidly growing real estate market in Abidjan. Whether you are a seasoned investor or new to the Ivorian market, our panel of experts will provide you with invaluable insights, data-driven analysis, and actionable strategies to maximize your returns and navigate the local landscape with confidence.

learning.title: What You'll Learn
learning.point1: Market analysis: Key growth drivers in Abidjan's property sector.
learning.point2: Investment hotspots: Identifying the most promising neighborhoods.
learning.point3: Legal framework: Navigating property acquisition and ownership laws.
learning.point4: Financing options: Securing local and international funding.

hero.title: Your Trusted Partner in Côte d'Ivoire Real Estate
hero.subtitle: Connecting you with exceptional properties and seamless service across Abidjan and beyond.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.description: At Q Homes, we believe that finding the perfect home should be transparent, secure, and stress-free. Our mission is to revolutionize the real estate experience in Côte d'Ivoire by providing verified listings, escrow-protected transactions, and personalized concierge services. We envision a future where every client — whether local or from the diaspora — can invest and live with complete confidence.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Q Homes?
whyChoose.subtitle: We go beyond traditional real estate services to deliver unmatched value and peace of mind.

verifiedListings.title: 100% Verified Listings

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services.
faq.q1: How do I schedule a property viewing?
faq.a1: You can schedule a viewing directly through our website by clicking 'Book Viewing' on any property listing, or contact our concierge team via WhatsApp or email.
faq.a2: We primarily serve Abidjan and surrounding areas, including Plateau, Cocody, Marcory, and emerging neighborhoods. We also assist with properties in Assinie and Grand-Bassam.
faq.q3: Do you offer property management services?
faq.a3: Yes, we provide comprehensive property management services for landlords, including tenant screening, rent collection, maintenance coordination, and regular property inspections.
faq.q4: How does your escrow service work?
faq.a4: Our escrow service acts as a neutral third party holding funds during the transaction. Money is only released when all contract conditions are met, ensuring security for both buyers and sellers.

cta.title: Prefer to Talk Directly?
cta.subtitle: Schedule a call with one of our experts to discuss your real estate needs in detail.
